## ⚠️ Please do not disclose vulnerabilities publicly

For security issues, prefer private disclosure:

- GitHub Security Advisories (private)
- Follow process in `docs/SECURITY.md`

If this public template was used, avoid sharing exploit details; maintainers may ask you to move details to a private channel.

(e.g., unauthorized mutation execution, ledger integrity bypass, privilege escalation)

- Component(s):
- Version/commit range:

- [ ] Medium
- [ ] High
- [ ] Critical
